today nuclear power produces about 13

everything around us is made of atoms

which means that the center of the atom
can break
the process of breaking the center of

is called nuclear fission
and it is this process that produces
nuclear energy

is found in rocks around the world

in nuclear power stations sticks of

other sticks called control rods

hot this hot water
moves through pipes and heats clean

moves steam
turbines

through
other things this moving energy

everything

so nuclear reactors have thick
